answers.answer: If you are awakening at night  to void large amounts of urine and go frequently during the daytime, then I would consider several possibilities. Large fluid intake is probably the most common cause as is your choice of fluids: coffee and alcohol will cause increased urine output as will “water   pills” (diuretics). Diabetes mellitus can also be a cause but the urine would not appear dilute. Diabetes  insipidus, a failure of the kidneys to keep water in the body, can be caused by the kidneys themselves or a failure of hormone production (vasopressin, or ADH—antidiuretic hormone).All of these problems are correctable, but you will have to go to physician  t get evaluated..Good luck!,S.A. Liroff, M.D.
